cause.description:
Animals our dying, the main cause of their death is humans... humans are causing, - global warming, which is melting the polar ice caps and killing animals that use them for there existence, - deforestation is causing many animals to loose their homes - poaching and shooting of animals - skinning and using animal fur
and lots more WE HAVE TO STOP THIS or one day another important species of animals will be extinct, the human
1. Melting of Polar Ice caps must end now
2. Deforestation must end
3. Animal Rights should be understood and respected
